generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks and lane markings, which is clearly identifiable as a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side of the road, separated by a curb and a fence, is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the image, including large structures with windows and roofs.
- fence: A metal fence is visible on the right side of the image, next to the sidewalk.

- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees.

- car: A car is visible parked on the right side of the road.
- train: There are tram tracks on the road, indicating the presence of a train (tram) system.
